pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
In poisson.py:

BVP -> LBVP

Also, I get an error on savefig:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "poisson.py", line 40, in <module>
    fig.savefig('poisson.png')
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'savefig'

If you try to print(fig) it returns None.
